About the Company: Future Retail Ltd is Indias leading retailer. It formerly known as Pantaloon Retail inspires trust through innovative offerings, quality products and affordable prices that help customers achieve a better quality of life every day. It serves customers in 95 cities across the country through around 10 million square feet of retail space. Future Retail is the flagship company of Future Group, Indias retail pioneer catering to the entire Indian consumption space. Through multiple retail formats, it connects a diverse and passionate community of Indian buyers, sellers and businesses.
